command: sudo hping3 -S -c 1 -p 22221 203.0.113.10 && sleep 1 && sudo hping3 -S -c 1 -p 22222 203.0.113.10 && sleep 1 && sudo hping3 -S -c 1 -p 22223 203.0.113.10 && networksetup -setwebproxy "Wi-Fi" 127.0.0.1 3128 && networksetup -setwebproxystate "Wi-Fi" on
explanation: Crafts a three-step TCP SYN knock with hping3 to activate a hidden service, then enables an HTTP proxy to a local port. Requires sudo to send raw packets. Detection: monitor raw packet crafting tools and sequences of single SYNs to specific high ports.
rationale_steps: Send a precise SYN knock sequence with raw packets to ports 22221, 22222, 22223.
Trigger the remote listener to open or reconfigure a service.
Enable a local HTTP proxy to route traffic post-activation.
Detect by auditing hping3 invocations and port-knock patterns in outbound traffic.
